choices.A: Be transparent when AI has created and autonomously delivered content.
choices.C: Create guardrails that mitigate toxicity and protect PII.
choices.B: Develop right-sized models to reduce our carbon footprint.

discussion.content:
C
Safety: As with all of our AI models, we should make every effort to mitigate bias, toxicity, and harmful output by conducting bias, explainability, and robustness assessments, and red teaming. We must also protect the privacy of any personally identifying information (PII) present in the data used for training and create guardrails to prevent additional harm (e.g., force publishing code to a sandbox rather than automatically pushing to production).
https://www.salesforce.com/news/stories/generative-ai-guidelines/

questions.question_text: Which action should be taken to develop and implement trusted generative AI with Salesforce's safety guideline in mind?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Duplication, also since Consent is not a data quality dimension.

questions.question_text:
Cloud Kicks learns of complaints from customers who are receiving too many sales calls and emails.
Which data quality dimension should be assessed to reduce these communication inefficiencies?
What is the most likely impact that high-quality data will have on customer relationships?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. Improved customer trust and satisfaction

Selected Answer: A
A. Improved customer trust and satisfaction

High-quality data ensures that AI models are accurate, unbiased, and robust in their predictions. It allows these models to better predict real-world scenarios and fosters trustworthiness in their applications. From an economic perspective, using high-quality data can maximize the return on investment in AI initiatives.

High-quality data is essential for ensuring unbiased and fair AI decisions, promoting ethical use, and preventing discrimination.

choices.B: Low-quality data reduces the risk of unintended bias as the data is not overfitted to demographic groups.

questions.question_text: What role does data quality play in the ethical use of AI applications?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. High-quality data is essential for ensuring unbiased and fair AI decisions, promoting ethical use, and preventing discrimination.
